trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Aloje uma coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewImageColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that display images.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DataGridViewImageColumn é um tipo especializado do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>classe utilizada para logicamente as células de anfitrião apresentam imagens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewImageColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Um DataGridViewImageColumn tem um associada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>em cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>intersetar que o mesmo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell is capable of containing an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> or an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Cada célula é capaz de que contém um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>ou um <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, consoante o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency.
trans-unit.target: Apresentar os ícones é útil para acomodar as imagens com transparência.

trans-unit.source: By default, empty cells display a default error graphic.
trans-unit.target: Por predefinição, as células em branco apresentam um gráfico de erro predefinida.

trans-unit.source: To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the cell style object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir a apresentação de valores de célula iguais a este gráfico `null` ou <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do objeto de estilo de célula devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade `null` antes de adicionar linhas ao controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: Isto não afeta a linha para novos registos, no entanto.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o gráfico de erro a apresentação na linha para novos registos quando o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>valor da propriedade é `true`, também tem definido explicitamente o valor de célula `null` um processador para o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>evento ou a coluna de conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade para uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-tipo com um substituída derivado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>propriedade devolve `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de ordenação predefinido para este tipo de coluna é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, configuring it for use with cell values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref> classe, configurá-lo para utilização com os valores do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor chama <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>com um `valuesAreIcons` valor do parâmetro `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, optionally configuring it for use with <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> cell values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref> classe, opcionalmente, configurá-lo para utilização com <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> valores da célula.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa a coluna definindo as seguintes propriedades.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>|The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.| To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>com a respetiva propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>inicializada para o `valuesAreIcons` valor do parâmetro. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>| O valor da `valuesAreIcons` parâmetro. | | A propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>do objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido pela propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | A propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>do objeto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvido pela propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | Um gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>se `valuesAreIcons` é `true` e escreva <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>se `valuesAreIcons` é `false`. | Para garantir que o canal alfa de <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>valores de célula é pintado corretamente, utilize este construtor com um `valuesAreIcons` valor do parâmetro `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property of cells in this column will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that they will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar que a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>de células nesta coluna será definida para valores do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar que serão definidas para valores do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modelo utilizado para criar novas células.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.
trans-unit.target: Os construtores para a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>classe inicializar esta propriedade para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> criado recentemente</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Alterar as propriedades do modelo de célula não imediatamente afetará a interface de utilizador (IU) das células da coluna existente.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Estas alterações são aparente apenas depois da coluna é novamente gerada (por exemplo, ao ordenar a coluna ou através de uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> que todos os outras células na coluna estão modeladas após.

trans-unit.source: The set type is not compatible with type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de conjunto não é compatível com o tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta coluna.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para duplicar uma coluna de células.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o clonado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo de célula predefinido da coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>devolvida por esta propriedade tem os seguintes valores de propriedade inicial: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` propriedade | Valor predefinido | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>| Um gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>se for o valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>inicial `true`; caso contrário, um gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>. | Estes valores substituem o valor especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controlo, mas pode ser substituído por outras propriedades de estilo de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [estilos de célula no controlo Windows Forms DataGridView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> cell values, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir a apresentação para o gráfico de erro padrão `null` ou <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>valores da célula, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade deste objeto de estilo de célula para `null` ou o seus próprios gráfico de erro antes de adicionar linhas ao controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: Isto não afeta a linha para novos registos, no entanto.

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null` or your own error graphic.
trans-unit.target: Para impedir que o gráfico de erro a apresentação na linha para novos registos quando o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>valor da propriedade é `true`, também tem definido explicitamente o valor de célula `null` ou o seus próprios gráfico erro um processador para o controlo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>evento ou a coluna de conjunto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade para uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-tipo com um substituída derivado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>propriedade devolve `null` ou o seus próprios gráfico de erro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pela propriedade DefaultCellStyle é tem um valor igual ao gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>valor da propriedade para `true` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>para o gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>tem um valor igual ao gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, alterar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>valor da propriedade para `false` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>para o gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> aplicada como o estilo predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma cadeia que descreve a imagem da coluna.

trans-unit.source: You can use the Description property to describe the image provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar a propriedade Description para descrever a imagem fornecida pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: This description provides an accessible alternative to the image.
trans-unit.target: Esta descrição forneça acessível alternativa para a imagem.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o texto de descrição é utilizado quando o valor de célula é copiado para a área de transferência.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>a propriedade de cada célula da coluna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The textual description of the column image.
trans-unit.target: Descrição textual da imagem de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ícone apresentado nas células desta coluna quando a célula <> </> *> propriedade não está definida e a célula <> </> *> propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Icon property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de ícone Especifica um ícones que é apresentado nas células com nenhuma valores quando a coluna não está vinculado a dados e a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>propriedade está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Para uma coluna de vinculados a dados cujas células não dispõe de uma imagem associada, é apresentado um gráfico de erro padrão.

trans-unit.source: Using the Icon property rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: Utilizando a propriedade de ícone em vez do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>propriedade garante que um canal alfa num ícone é pintado corretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se pretende apresentar um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>em vez de um <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>propriedade em vez disso e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or the Icon property value.
trans-unit.target: Também pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>propriedade de células individuais para indicar se a célula apresenta o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>ou o valor da propriedade ícone.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> para apresentar.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a imagem apresentada nas células desta coluna quando a célula <> </> *> propriedade não está definida e a célula <> </> *> propriedade está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Image property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Image Especifica uma imagem que é apresentada nas células com nenhuma valores quando a coluna não está vinculado a dados e a célula <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>propriedade está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Para uma coluna de vinculados a dados cujas células não dispõe de uma imagem associada, é apresentado um gráfico de erro padrão.

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se pretende apresentar um <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>em vez de um <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>propriedade em vez disso e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the alpha channel of the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: Isto garante que o canal alfa do <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>é pintado corretamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the Image or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property value when there is no cell value.
trans-unit.target: Também pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>propriedade de células individuais para indicar se a célula apresenta a imagem ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>valor da propriedade quando não existe nenhum valor de célula.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> para apresentar.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o esquema da imagem nas células para esta coluna.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref> that specifies the cell layout.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref> que especifica o esquema de célula.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia que descreve a coluna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que descreve a coluna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in this column display <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as células nesta coluna apresentam <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que o canal alfa de <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>valores é pintado corretamente, defina esta propriedade como `true`.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou definir esta propriedade obtém ou define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Definição desta propriedade também define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>apresentar a coluna de propriedade de cada célula na coluna e as atualizações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir o valor especificado para as células individuais, defina os valores das células depois de definir o valor de coluna.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>propriedade do objeto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>propriedade tem um valor igual ao gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, alterar o valor da propriedade ValuesAreIcons para `true` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>para o gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>tem um valor igual ao gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, alterar o valor da propriedade ValuesAreIcons para `false` define automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>para o gráfico de erro padrão do tipo <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as células apresentam valores do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se células apresentam valores do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>
